virtual bool ibase::IFileConvertCopy::CopyFile ( const istd::CString &  inputFilePath,
const istd::CString &  outputFilePath,
const iprm::IParamsSet *  paramsPtr = NULL 
) const [pure virtual]

Copy a file inputFilePath to destination outputFilePath.

Optionally, you can use paramsPtr to control the copy process.

Implemented in ibase::CExternalFileConverterComp, ibase::CFileConvertOverProcessorComp, ibase::CFileCopyOverLoaderComp, ibase::CSelectableFileConverterComp, and iqt::CFileInfoCopyComp.
